title: vandu paNindEnayyA
sahitya:
vandu paNindEnayyA sendUrttalam tEDi endan nalam nADi kandAvenrODi


anupallavi

  cintai enadenrum enda vidhamum ini nondu ayarAdirukka undan aruL peravE


caraNam    tuyarak-kaDaliDaiyE tuDikkum aDiyArai dayavuDan tAngiDat-tayangAdaNaivOnE
bhaya bhaktiyuDanE un pAdamE satam enru bhAvittu varum en pAvam pOghumenrE
